summary: Set in a future Bangkok, the story picks-up after a hit-gone-wrong on "Iron Cop", the area police chief. The would-be killer "Pae", together with his equally inept collection of thugs, now become wanted men themselves as the Thai underworld bristles with the shame & dishonor of such an ignoble bungling.
cast: Suthep Po-ngam|Somchai Kemglad|Sornsutha Klunmalee|Petchtai Wongkamlao|Pongsak Pongsuwan|Jaran 'See Tao' Petcharoen|Pailin Pichitumphol
keywords: soldier killed|police uniform stolen|impersonating a police officer|thai police|police officer killed by soldier
title: Killer Tattoo
